name: Tesco Large Pork Leg Joint
description: Rind on pork leg crackling joint
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Oven><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven><Microwave><Item23 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave><Barbeque /><Grill /><Shallow_Fry /><Deep_Fry /><Stir_Fry /><Steam /><Poach /><Hob /><Boil_In_The_Bag /><Other_Instructions>Oven: Remove all packaging. Allow to rest for 5-10 minutes allowing the colour to return and the natural odour  to dissipate. Place the joint in a roasting tin in the centre of a pre heated oven. Calculate the cooking times at 30 minutes per 500g plus 30 minutes. Cook for first 30 minutes at 230°C/Fan 210°C/Gas Mark 8. Reduce the oven temperature to 180°C /Fan 160°C/Gas Mark 4 for remaining time. Allow the joint to rest in a warm place for 10 minutes before carving. Remove netting/string prior to carving. </Other_Instructions><Oven_From_Frozen><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven_From_Frozen><Microwave_From_Frozen><Item24 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave_From_Frozen><Cooking_Precautions>All appliances vary these are guidelines only.Tesco recommend that all meat products are cooked thoroughly.Not suitable for microwave cooking.Not suitable for cooking from frozen.</Cooking_Precautions></Cooking_Instructions><Freezing_Instructions><Freezing_Guidelines>Suitable for home freezing. Freeze on day of purchase. Use within one month.</Freezing_Guidelines><Defrosting>Defrost thoroughly for a minimum of 24  hours in the refrigerator.IMPORTANT: If food has thawed, do not refreeze.</Defrosting></Freezing_Instructions>
PromotionDescription: 25 extra points on any fresh pork Pre-packed or from the meat counter
